plugin enhances the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor with Autocompletion functionality. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed\n\nIt adds Autocompletion for ''html'', ''javascript'' and ''xml'' and also for ''already present words'' within a text-editor instance\n\nThe ''Keyboard Shortcut'' for autocompletion is `Ctrl+Space`\n\n"}}}
